items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: My five star rating is based on the item itself not particularly on how well it's suited me. First of all the fabric is lovely, it's heavy enough not to be clingy or seem cheap but lightweight enough that it's not stiff - it is very soft - and it moves well. It does not wrinkle at all. It looks like a dress but it feels like a nightgown. The slit is high up on the leg - I'm not sure if that's good or bad but it is a rather high slit - up to the knee for me. The color is a very nice, soft navy blue. I am 5 ft tall and weigh about 135 lb and small fits very nicely, it's not too tight, has room to move around and feel comfortable doesn't cling too much but it's not boxy or sloppy looking. Having said that I am not sure that I would wear this out as a dress because it does have rather a nightgown feel and look to it but you could wear it out as a dress. My personal problem is that while the length is fine and the fit is fine and even the sleeves are fine the shoulder seams, which are not raglan shoulders, come way down on my arms and so it looks kind of sloppy and like it doesn't really fit me. I like it well enough that I thought about buying another one in another color. It is certainly worth the price I paid.. It is comfortable to wear around the house and while you feel relaxed you don't feel sloppy or undressed. I have not washed it yet so I don't know how well it will launder but I am very pleased with this garment. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfy
items.body: This is a cute, fun dress for teachers that is stylish yet won’t break the bank! Washes well and seems well-made. The colors didn’t bleed and the fit is true to size. Definitely a win that is comfy and affordable! Read more
items.author: Liane

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but baggy
items.body: The fit is a little baggy, but with a sweater over it, it looks cute. Read more
items.author: Lindsay Lowrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile dress up or down tee shirt dress
items.body: This is like a long, soft tee shirt, only nicer looking. It was so comfortable. I wore it to teach in, with white tennis shoes. Dress it up for later with heels. It has a hoochie-mama slit (no one wants to see my old legs) so I sewed it closed which was very easy the way the sewed it. It’s very well made. Shoulder seams are just off-shoulder. Color is exactly as pictured. This will be comfortable in all seasons. I like this so much this is my third color. I am 5’4, 160# Read more
items.author: Lynn B.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin material
items.body: Material was thin. Color red is very bright. Looks like the picture. More of an early fall piece with thickness of material. Comfortable! Read more
items.author: RAmazon Customer1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Dress
items.body: Amazing, super beautiful, soft, Luscious fabric that hangs really, really well. True to size. I love this dress and I plan to buy it in multiple colors. Can easily dress up for formal or dress with casual accessories. Very flexible. Great for travel and at home wear. I highly recommend this dress Read more
items.author: RSC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, true to size
items.body: Dress is great, material is soft. I have 2 of them and am very happy with the quality and fit! Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect throw on!
items.body: Besides the slit being a bit high on the side, which I fixed myself, due to it needing a slip underneath and the slip showing, I LOVE THIS DRESS! It’s a comfortable throw on which can be dressed up or down! I’m 5’3” and weigh 167 and bought an XL. My weight is distributed evenly throughout my body, as I’m more of a rectangle shape. I bought 2 and love them both! One in brown and one in green and the color is as pictured. Read more
items.author: G Stephens

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown White Stripe, Green White Stripe, Army Green, Floral Colorful, Black, Coffee, Floral Pink White, Navy Blue, White Black Stripe, Brick Orange, Red, Blue White Stripe, Royal Blue, Floral Blue White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
